svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));
fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));
fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 58px; height: 1px; padding-top: 10px; margin-left: 451px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #0066CC;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#0066CC, #56aeff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 68px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 791px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #CC6600;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#CC6600, #d47d25); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 68px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 446px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #009900;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#009900, #32b532); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 68px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 166px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #CC9900;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#CC9900, #966a00); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 345px; margin-left: 61px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 377px; margin-left: 62px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #333333;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#333333, #c1c1c1); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Legend:
┈┈┈▷ Implementation (implements)
◇─── Aggregation (has-a)
┈┈┈→ Dependency (uses)
Pattern Components:
• Target: Interface client expects
• Adaptee: Existing incompatible class
• Adapter: Converts Adaptee to Target
• Client: Works with Target interface

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 337px; margin-left: 382px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
How It Works:
1. Client (AudioPlayer) works with
MediaPlayer interface
2. For advanced formats (vlc, mp4),
it uses MediaAdapter
3. MediaAdapter translates
MediaPlayer calls to
AdvancedMediaPlayer calls
4. AdvancedMediaPlayer handles
the actual playback

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 337px; margin-left: 662px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 229px; margin-left: 501px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #666666;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#666666, #959595); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 58px; height: 1px; padding-top: 243px; margin-left: 631px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #666666;

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
